nodes.text: Camp Kavel was a military encampment that was established on the planet Pleida.

During a conflict on Pleida, one faction forced the other to retreat and established Camp Kavel in the evacuated zone. However, a number of their command officers were injured, so the surgeon Lieutenant Pleth Juun was sent to travel to the camp and treat them. However, the advancing side did not have air superiority in the area, so they couldn't fly Juun in and instead, a group of agents were assigned to escort her there.
